permissions: Allowed when the user is authorized for the related material site (policy delegates authorization via the material_site relationship).
side_effects: Updates a material site unavailability record.
validation_notes: At least one of --start-at, --end-at, or --description must be provided. start-at and end-at must be RFC3339 timestamps. If start-at is provided, end-at must be later than start-at. Records must have at least one of start-at or end-at present. Overlapping unavailabilities for the same material site are rejected. Unavailabilities are rejected when they overlap job production plans for the material site.
